thread.title: MOVES-Blackstone appoints William Burns senior adviser
thread.title_full: MOVES-Blackstone appoints William Burns senior adviser | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: MOVES-Blackstone appoints William Burns senior adviser
text:
July 13 Blackstone Group LP appointed former U.S. Deputy Secretary of State William Burns as senior adviser.
Burns, currently president of the Carnegie Endowment for International Peace, will provide strategic counsel on geopolitical issues, Blackstone said. (Reporting by Kshitiz Goliya in Bengaluru; Editing by Ted Kerr )
